Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/73rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Marquette, Pulaski, 76th and Ford City: due to, street blockage near Cicero/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Marquette, Pulaski, 76th and Ford City: due to, street blockage near Cicero/73rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Division
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Division due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Division due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays Limited Service
ShortDescription: Green Line service limited service. Shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, trains are operating in one section:

  • between Harlem and Ashland/63rd

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service to Cottage Grove.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
